lead_paragraph: According to an official inquiry, the American-led attacks in September were conducted under the “good-faith belief” that the targets were Islamic State militants.

headline.print_headline: Human Error Led to Strikes in Syria, U.S. Reports
headline.main: ‘Unintentional’ Human Error Led to Airstrikes on Syrian Troops, Pentagon Says
